featured.text: Amy followed her, trying to recall how each one had looked when they were filled with furniture and rugs and pictures and books.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於地板上的織物，通常用來提供舒適或裝飾。
definition.en_def: A piece of thick fabric that covers part of a floor, often used for comfort or decoration.
definition.example: She placed a beautiful rug in the living room to add warmth.
